name: ship24-client
title: Ship24 Package Tracker
description: Track your packages and shipments with Ship24's powerful tracking service. Add parcels, monitor delivery status in real-time, and get detailed tracking history. Free plan includes 10 packages per month. Unofficial extension for Ship24.com with support for 1200+ carriers worldwide.
author: Pr0tey

commands.name: my-packages
commands.title: My Packages
commands.subtitle: Ship24 Package Tracker
commands.description: View and manage all your tracked packages with real-time delivery status. Add new packages with âŒ˜N. Track from 1200+ carriers worldwide including DHL, FedEx, UPS, USPS, Amazon, and more.

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: Ship24 API Key
preferences.description: Get your free API key from ship24.com to start tracking packages. Sign up at ship24.com and find your API key in the dashboard.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
